title: COVID-19: From Origins to Public Health
author: Dr. Elizabeth Thompson et al.
text: COVID-19 poses a more significant threat to public health than the common flu, warranting extensive public health efforts to mitigate its spread...

title: World Health Organization (WHO)
author: World Health Organization (WHO) www.who.int
text: Contrary to the notion that COVID-19 is no worse than the flu, extensive global data and scientific research consistently demonstrate that COVID-19 is more transmissible...

title: Comparing COVID-19 and Influenza
author: New England Journal
text: Numerous studies and clinical observations have established that COVID-19 is distinct from seasonal influenza in terms of its higher transmission rate, greater severity...
